title: Latest Thunderbird Update 139.0 (20250522211142) Dated May 27, 2025 has stopped updating AT&T email
content:
Latest Thunderbird update 139.0 (20250522211142) dated May 27, 2025 has stopped updating AT&T email. AT&T email setup as IMAP and has worked for the past 6 months with no issues. On May 27 new emails have stopped being received after the latest update. The online AT&T Yahoo email app continues to function and updates to current emails received and sent. The Email and password have not changed. No other settings have changed. Anyone else having this issue?

If this cannot be corrected, I cannot continue using Thunderbird. Help!
creator: s.geer

title: Change the time zone in Thunderbird
content:
Thunderbird is time-stamping emails I send and receive in a different time zone. How do I change the time zone it is using? I'm using 128.10.0esr (64-bit) on a Macbook running Sequoia 15.4.1.

Thanks in advance for any assistance.
creator: queenmab100

title: Certain emails going directly to deleted box and it's driving me crazy

title: Thunderbird139.0でQuick Textのアドオンが使用できなくなった
content:
Thunderbirdの138.0.2まで使用できていたアドオン「Quick Text」が勝手にThunderbirdが139.0にアップデートされたことにより、突然使用できなくなりました。

例文などをたくさん登録して仕事でも使用している方が多数だったのでクレームが殺到して困っております。

Quick Text が139.0でも使用できるようにしてください！！
creator: reftest20211126

(I am running MacOS Sequoia on a MacBook Air)

title: [SOLVED] [139.0/Windows] Inbox layout changed: How to to fix?
content:
Hello,

I don't know what happened, but all of sudden, the layout changed, see attachment.

None of the items in the View menu seem to work.

How can I go back to how it was before?

Thank you. -- Edit: FWIW, I hid the Unified Toolbar by adding the userChrome.css file. https://support.mozilla.org/hu/questions/1418113#answer-1590935

-- Edit: Found it. https://support.mozilla.org/gl/questions/1508029
creator: littlebigman

content:

title: Repeat requests to signin on googleapis via TB after deleting account from TB
content: I recently deleted a gmail account from my TB. It was a shared account so that account is still open but I have no more need of accessing it. So I went into my TB\Account Actions\Remove Account. It no longer exists on my main TB page which shows my different email accounts. Suddenly, and constantly, I have this window pop up, requesting my login info, which I no longer have. When I close the window, it just opens back up. I have to close it in order to get to my main TB window. It's horribly frustrating. Any ideas??
creator: modestdecency
